Same deal here. 
I went out today to stock up on a few extra cans of food just in case. It was insanity. Not only was it the day after a holiday, not only were people getting extra stuff in case of emergencies but it was also a Sunday after church
I'm amazed I'm still alive

I just wash mine whenever it gets greasy. 

I really do not deserve to look as good as I do considering how much of a lazy shit I am. My hair is fabulous even though I don't do anything to it, my frame mostly hides how fat I am and I swear there was a point in my life several years ago where I would go about a month At a time  without brushing my teeth and yet I've never had a single cavity.
